response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and efficiency of your operations. Given its exceptional worth to you, valued at $1,500,000, I am extending an exclusive offer to acquire it at a price tailored to reflect its immense value while ensuring a fair transaction for both parties. Considering the unique benefits and opportunities this product presents, I propose a purchase price of $1,400,000. This offer is designed to maximize your investment while allowing me to maintain a competitive edge in the market. I look forward to discussing the details further and exploring how we can collaborate to achieve mutual success. Please let me know if you require any additional information or have questions about the product or the proposal.", "product_price": 1400000}
